description: Epoch aligned to each snapshot (init is 0).
Frobenius norm of recurrent weight W.
‖S‖_F / (‖W‖_F + ε); fraction of W’s energy that is symmetric.
‖(W Wᵀ − Wᵀ W)‖_F; 0 if W is normal (commutes with its transpose).
max |λ_i(W)|; falls back to power-iteration proxy if full eig fails.
max |λ_i(A)| for antisymmetric part A (equals max imaginary magnitude for ideal skew-symmetric).
Fraction of sampled grid points with min σ(zI−W) < 1e−1 (only if --grid_ps enabled).
Fraction with min σ(zI−W) < 5e−2 (only if --grid_ps enabled).
Fraction with min σ(zI−W) < 1e−2 (only if --grid_ps enabled).
